Smallyellow Version updated 11-Aug-2018

Page.name: Alchemy
Page.text: Alchemy is the art of making essences and metal bars. You
will use essences to cast magic spells and as ingredients
in some items, and metal bars for manufacturing armors
and weapons and for crafting magic rings and medallions.
* Indicates bars from ores that have been discovered, but
we aren't sure how to harvest them or what they are used
for yet. Our scientists are working on it.

Page.name: Armors
Page.text: Armor sets are made up of separate parts: helm, torso,
pants, boots and shields; different materials are used
in making armor, like leather, iron, steel and
titanium. This results in many possible combinations.

Page.name: Attributes
Page.text: You can trade pickpoints that you get from overall levels
for X-attributes at the Wraith. The attribute system is
still in development. If you want to change your attribute
allocation you can buy a soft reset from the OL store.
You get 1.8 pickpoint per OA, rounded down.
The information in this section is taken from the forum:

Page.name: Books
Page.text: To advance in the game you will need to read many books.
Here you can find a list of book sellers and the books
which can be found at each.
Dan (Market place in White Stone City)
Itilli (Registry Room in Tarsengaard Magic School)
Monsters Drop Only (NPCs don't sell these books)

Page.name: Clothes
Page.text: Clothes can protect you from cold, from heat, or make
you look nice! There are also magic clothes like some

Page.name: Creatures
Page.text: Many creatures can be encountered in Other Life:
some are peaceful unless you attack them, others are
monsters ready to attack anyone on sight, so be careful

Page.name: Engineering
Page.text: The Engineering skill allows you to create several
dangerous substances like blackpowder or items like
It also makes you able to create devices like night

Page.name: Gods
Page.text: The Gods of OL have their temples all over Seridia.
Serving a god and completing the tasks given by the
priests will make you get more experience in the
related skill, and you'll be able to receive blessings.
You can worship up to 3 Gods if they are not enemies.
* Indicates that the priest of the god is not ingame yet.

Page.name: Harvesting
Page.text: Harvesting items can be a hazardous activity with random
stings from bees while above ground, and having cavern
walls fall on you in caves.
There are many types of harvesting accidents that can
occur, but also lots of good things.

Page.name: Jewelry
Page.text: Several Jewelry items can be crafted: polished gems,
rings and medallions. You can combine these elements to
create many magic items, like teleport rings (single use)
or rings and medallions that can help you in combat.

Page.name: Magic
Page.text: This section describes how to cast spells. Spells require
different combinations of sigils for casting, and use up
reagents each time they are cast. Sigils can be bought
from either of the two magic shops in White Stone, where
they cost either 400 or 700 gold, depending on the sigil.
Sigils are infinite use items, and can't be lost, broken,

Page.name: Maps
Page.text: Here you will find info about Maps. Click the names for
more info. PK=Player Killing, MC=Multi Combat.

Page.name: Maps_DL
Page.text: Here you will find info about Maps. Click the names for
more info. PK=Player Killing, MC=Multi Combat.

Page.name: Maps_HL
Page.text: Here you will find info about Maps. Click the names for
more info. PK=Player Killing, MC=Multi Combat.

Page.name: Misc
Page.text: An overview of the tools, food, drinks and other items

Page.name: Perks
Page.text: You can get perks from the Wraith on Isla Prima.
Perks are permanent and will stay with you even when you
die. For this reason, think carefully before taking one.

Page.name: Potions
Page.text: Many flowers and plants grow in OL, and many minerals
can be found in the mines. Potioning is the art of mixing
all this resources in order to create potions which can
temporarily increase your abilities, or restore your mana
Books for these potions are not for sale at an NPC.

Page.name: Summoning
Page.text: With summoning you can bring to life creatures from a set
of ingredients. These creatures will follow you around
and attack any animal or monster on sight. They will also
attack other players in PK maps.

Page.name: Tailoring
Page.text: Tailoring is art of making beautiful and elegant clothes.
You start with fabric weaving and making dyes, and go on
to sewing a variety of items: from tunics to fancy hats,
in a variety of colors that allows players to change their

Page.name: Weapons
Page.text: There is a great number of weapons for the fighters to
choose: swords, axes, staves and more.
Every weapon has its own characteristic which can match
or not the fighting style preferred by a player.

Page.name: Ench_Weapons
Page.text: There are several elemental varieties of the base swords.
When degraded, they will turn into a modable version of
that same type. These can then be recycled.
When a modable degrades it turns into a normal version
